channel.title: Team on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Team on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: How to make your module compliant with PrestaShop’s Official GDPR Compliance Module
item.description: Everybody must already know, there are a few steps to follow in order to make your module compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

item.title: PrestaShop is hiring
item.description: You are a developer, you love PrestaShop and are passionate about open source? Maybe you are even already a contributor to our project? Then what are you waiting for, let’s work together!

item.title: PrestaShop loves its community
item.description: And here comes the nice surprise… 2018 is here, following the gregorian calendar, let us wish you a successful and happy new year again!

item.title: Uncle Build makes an assessment
item.description: Dear readers, followers, developers, translators, PrestaShopers from all sides, we call for your opinion about the devblog, you answered, thank you so much!

item.title: Uncle Build wants you!
item.description: Dear readers, followers, developers, translators, PrestaShopers from all sides, it is time to lean over what will be next for Build!

item.title: The PrestaCrew is always hiring!
item.description: Looking to have an impact on +270.000 users all at once? Look no further! PrestaShop is always willing to hire new talents, and this special post will point to some specific roles we are looking to add to our current roster.

item.title: How to best contact us
item.description: There are many ways to connect with the PrestaShop team. From support requests to development contributions, we’re here to work with you!

item.title: Meet the team building PrestaShop 1.7
item.description: These days, the product & dev open-space is quiet but the minds are working like crazy! We’re starting 2016 by giving a huge push on PrestaShop 1.7 and as you’ve read here, that includes a lot of important projects.

item.title: The PrestaCrew is hiring more sailors
item.description: The team at PrestaShop is busy preparing what’s ahead for our e-commerce boat and community. There’s a lot coming and we’re looking for some extra hands to come aboard. So, what’s this all about?
